full_text: Pitchers should NEVER be pulled from perfect game bids. There are no acceptable other opinions to this.

For my money, Steven Kwan is the story of the @MLB so far this year. This guy is awesome and the Guardians are relevant in a year where they spent basically $0 in the offseason because of him. https://t.co/CXmFJ2mWgg
Brandon Marsh needs to be in the lineup everyday. @Angels
